title: Part Two Chapter 6
content: "As for the rest, the main purport of your life, I have no fears for you. I press your hand warmly."Rita." The Bureau agreed, although Bartelik objected to the delay. A few days later Pavel was on his way to Kharkov. The Regional Committee of the Party had finally granted his insistent request to be released from his job and placed at the disposal of the Central Committee of the Ukrainian Komsomol. He had been given a good testimonial. Akim was one of the secretaries of the Central Committee.

book.title: How The Steel Was Tempered 钢铁是怎样炼成的
book.description: 简介： 《钢铁是怎样炼成的》是前苏联作家尼古拉奥斯特洛夫斯基所著的一部长篇小说，于1933年写成。小说通过记叙保尔柯察金的成长道路告诉人们，一个人只有在革命的艰难困苦中战胜敌人也战胜自己，只有在把自己的追求和祖国、人民的利益联系在一起的时候，才会创造出奇迹，才会...
